nodes.text: Riss Clyos was a Rebel pilot in the Rebel Alliance's Green Squadron who flew as Green Three. They most notably fought in the battle of Scarif.

Riss Clyos first appeared through their X-wing starfighter in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. They were then identified in Star Wars: Rogue One: The Ultimate Visual Guide where their helmet was pictured but not Clyos.
